# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I propose a special introductory price of $140. This is a fantastic opportunity to experience the quality and benefits of our product at a discounted rate compared to its usual value of $150. I trust it will meet your expectations and contribute positively to your needs. Please let me know if this offer suits you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
